snippet: The procedure, which is planned for Friday, is not expected to keep the mayor from public events over the weekend, his press secretary said.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's office says he will undergo surgery for hernia.
lead_paragraph: The procedure, which is planned for Friday, is not expected to keep the mayor from public events over the weekend, his press secretary said.

headline.main: Mayor Bill de Blasio to Undergo Hernia Operation
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Will Undergo an Operation for a Hernia
